content.rendered:
Directed by Shawn Arranha.

Written by Himesh Reshammiya.

Cast Himesh Reshammiya(Raghu). Farah Karimaee(Tara (as Farah Karimi)). Naseeruddin Shah(Robin ‘The Bird’ Dharamraj Santino). Shekhar Kapur(Rajeev Kaul). Shernaz Patel(Tara’s mother). Monica Dogra(Elle Jordan). Kabir Bedi(AA Khan). Suneel Dutt(Drug trafficker). Myles Molloy(Police Officer (as Graham Molloy)). Ann Marie O’Connor(Policewoman). Richard O’Leary(Policeman). Warren Renwick(Policeman). Degnan Geraghty(Col. Trueman Head of Irish Inteligence) . Habib Al Aidroos(Aurangzeb). Abhishek Duhan(Haider). Ahmed Jawed Khan Pathaan(fahim ansari). Ahmad Jawed Khan Pathan(Fahim ansari). Niraj Singh(Farooq Ansari). Ravi Singh(Indian Man)

Languages English. Hindi.

Producers Hanif Chunawala. Kathy Horgan. Sonia Kapoor. Michael Parle. Vipin Reshammiya. Rajendra Toraskar. Rakesh Upadhyay.

Production H.R. Musik. Picture Perfect.
